title: List Budget Utilities with FloPy - Budget Data Processing
description: Demonstrates FloPy's list budget utilities for reading and processing MODFLOW budget data from list files. Shows budget analysis, time series processing, dataframe conversion, and model diagnostics.

package_details.CHD: Constant head boundaries on north/south edges
package_details.WEL: Time-varying pumping wells with increasing rates
package_details.OC: Comprehensive budget output for list file analysis

key_features: MODFLOW 6 model with comprehensive budget output
Mf6ListBudget utility for list file processing
Time series analysis with incremental/cumulative data
Multiple list budget utility classes demonstration
learning_objectives: Understanding FloPy list budget utility classes
Processing MODFLOW budget data from list files
Budget component analysis and time series extraction
Converting budget data to pandas DataFrames
